sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('SELECT 1
FROM [dwh].[STG_CUSTOMS_DEC] as SCD
WHERE 
(
try_convert(nvarchar(200), NULLIF([NotificationSender], '''')) IS NULL
OR try_convert(datetime, NULLIF([NotificationDate], '''')) IS NULL
OR try_convert(nvarchar(200), NULLIF([NotificationRef], '''')) IS NULL
OR try_convert(nvarchar(200), NULLIF([bolNumber], '''')) IS NULL
OR try_convert(nvarchar(200), NULLIF([declarationNo], '''')) IS NULL
OR try_convert(nvarchar(200), NULLIF([declarationStatus], '''')) IS NULL
OR try_convert(nvarchar(200), NULLIF([declarationType], '''')) IS NULL
OR NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM dwh.STG_CUSTOMS_ITEM AS SCI WHERE sci.declarationNo=SCD.declarationNo)
)
AND [NotificationRef] = ','''',activity('Lookup1').output.firstRow.NotificationRef,'''')

activities.name: GetFileList
activities.description: Get file list from processing container

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select DISTINCT DS_FILENAME FROM dwh.STG_COMPANY_VALID;
SELECT 1;

select DISTINCT DS_FILENAME FROM dwh.STG_PRODUCTS_VALID;
SELECT 1;

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('select CASE WHEN COUNT(*)=0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS LKP from dwh.DWL_PRODUCTS T1 INNER JOIN DWH.DWL_ENTITY T2
ON T1.ID_COMPANY=T2.ID_ENTITY_ORG WHERE T2.DS_ENTITY_CR = ','''',activity('LookupColumns').output.value[1],'''')

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		MainorBranch as string,
		CompanyNameArabic as string,
		CompanyNameEnglish as string,
		CommercialRegistrationNo as string,
		CommercialLicensenumber as string,
		Area as string,
		StreetName as string,
		AreaNumber as string,
		StreetNumber2 as string,
		BuildingNumber as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		Fax as string,
		{P.O.Box} as string,
		Email as string,
		Website as string,
		MapLocationUrl as string,
		ID_SK as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		DT_FILETIME as timestamp,
		ID_ERROR_CODE as integer,
		DS_ERROR_CODE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: true) ~> stgcompanyerrorlog
stgcompanyerrorlog derive(DS_FILENAME = replace((replace(DS_FILENAME,'.xlsx','_company_err.csv')),'.xls','_company_err.csv')) ~> dsfilename
dsfilename sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'DS_FILENAME',
	umask: 0777,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		MainorBranch,
		CompanyNameArabic,
		CompanyNameEnglish,
		CommercialRegistrationNo,
		CommercialLicensenumber,
		Area,
		StreetName,
		AreaNumber,
		StreetNumber2,
		BuildingNumber,
		PhoneNumber,
		Fax,
		Box = {P.O.Box},
		Email,
		Website,
		MapLocationUrl,
		DS_ERROR_CODE
	)) ~> errorlogcompany

source(output(
		SEQ as string,
		NAME as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		PHONE as string,
		EXTENSION as string,
		MOBILE as string,
		ENTITYCR as string,
		ID_SK as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		DT_FILETIME as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: true) ~> stgcontacterrlog
stgcontacterrlog derive(DS_FILENAME = replace((replace(DS_FILENAME,'.xlsx','_err.csv')),'.xls','_err.csv')) ~> dsfilename
dsfilename sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'DS_FILENAME',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0777,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		SEQ,
		NAME,
		EMAIL,
		PHONE,
		EXTENSION,
		MOBILE,
		ENTITYCR,
		ID_SK,
		DS_FILENAME,
		DT_FILETIME
	)) ~> errorlogcontact

source(output(
		STORECODE as string,
		ENTITYCOMMERCIALREGISTRATIONNO as string,
		ENTITYCOMMERCIALLICENSENO as string,
		WAREHOUSESTORECOMMERCIALREGISTRATIONNO as string,
		WAREHOUSESTORECOMMERCIALLICENSENO as string,
		WAREHOUSESTORECODE as string,
		AREANAME as string,
		STNAME as string,
		AREACODE as string,
		STNO as string,
		BUILDINGID as string,
		MAPLOCATIONURL as string,
		TOTALSTOREAREAM2 as string,
		STORAGECAPACITYINTON as string,
		STORAGETYPE as string,
		ID_SK as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		DT_FILETIME as timestamp,
		ID_ERROR_CODE as integer,
		DS_ERROR_CODE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: true) ~> stgwarehouseerrorlog
stgwarehouseerrorlog derive(DS_FILENAME = replace((replace(DS_FILENAME,'.xlsx','_warehouse_err.csv')),'.xls','_warehouse_err.csv')) ~> dsfilename
dsfilename sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'DS_FILENAME',
	umask: 0777,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		STORECODE,
		ENTITYCOMMERCIALREGISTRATIONNO,
		ENTITYCOMMERCIALLICENSENO,
		WAREHOUSESTORECOMMERCIALREGISTRATIONNO,
		WAREHOUSESTORECOMMERCIALLICENSENO,
		WAREHOUSESTORECODE,
		AREANAME,
		STNAME,
		AREACODE,
		STNO,
		BUILDINGID,
		MAPLOCATIONURL,
		TOTALSTOREAREAM2,
		STORAGECAPACITYINTON,
		STORAGETYPE,
		DS_ERROR_CODE
	)) ~> errorlogwarehouse

parameters{
	fileName as string ('22071_Entity.xlsx')
}
source(output(
		{Seq-} as string,
		{Name-} as string,
		{eMail-  } as string,
		{Phone-} as string,
		{Extension-} as string,
		{Mobile-} as string,
		{Entity CR-  } as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> inputcontactcontainer
Filter1 derive(DS_FILENAME = $fileName,
		DT_FILETIME = left(toString(fromUTC(currentTimestamp(), 'Asia/Istanbul')),19)) ~> AddColumn
AddColumn keyGenerate(output(ID_SK as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
inputcontactcontainer select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			regexReplace($$,'[^0-9a-zA-Z]','') = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 filter(isNull(iifNull(iifNull(EntityCR,Name,eMail),iifNull(Phone,Extension,Mobile))) != true()) ~> Filter1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SEQ as string,
		NAME as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		PHONE as string,
		EXTENSION as string,
		MOBILE as string,
		ENTITYCR as string,
		ID_SK as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		DT_FILETIME as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		SEQ = Seq,
		NAME = Name,
		EMAIL = eMail,
		PHONE = Phone,
		EXTENSION = Extension,
		MOBILE = Mobile,
		ENTITYCR = EntityCR,
		ID_SK,
		DS_FILENAME,
		DT_FILETIME
	)) ~> sink1

parameters{
	fileName as string ('a')
}
source(output(
		{Store Code- } as string,
		{Entity Commercial Registration No-   } as string,
		{Entity Commercial License No-   } as string,
		{Warehouse/Store Commercial Registration No-   } as string,
		{Warehouse/Store Commercial License No-   } as string,
		{Warehouse/Store Code- } as string,
		{Area Name- } as string,
		{St. Name-  } as string,
		{Area Code- } as string,
		{St. No- } as string,
		{Building ID-  } as string,
		{Map Location URL-} as string,
		{Total Store Area M2-   } as string,
		{Storage Capacity in TON-  } as string,
		{Storage Type- } as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
Filter1 derive(DS_FILENAME = $fileName,
		DT_FILETIME = left(toString(fromUTC(currentTimestamp(), 'Asia/Istanbul')),19)) ~> AddColumn
AddColumn keyGenerate(output(ID_SK as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			regexReplace($$,'[^0-9a-zA-Z]','') = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 filter(isNull(iifNull(iifNull(StoreCode,EntityCommercialRegistrationNo,EntityCommercialLicenseNo),iifNull(WarehouseStoreCommercialRegistrationNo,WarehouseStoreCommercialLicenseNo,WarehouseStoreCode),iifNull(iifNull(AreaName,StName,AreaCode),
iifNull(StNo,BuildingID,MapLocationURL),iifNull(TotalStoreAreaM2,StorageCapacityinTON,StorageType))))!= true()) ~> Filter1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		STORECODE as string,
		ENTITYCOMMERCIALREGISTRATIONNO as string,
		ENTITYCOMMERCIALLICENSENO as string,
		WAREHOUSESTORECOMMERCIALREGISTRATIONNO as string,
		WAREHOUSESTORECOMMERCIALLICENSENO as string,
		WAREHOUSESTORECODE as string,
		AREANAME as string,
		STNAME as string,
		AREACODE as string,
		STNO as string,
		BUILDINGID as string,
		MAPLOCATIONURL as string,
		TOTALSTOREAREAM2 as string,
		STORAGECAPACITYINTON as string,
		STORAGETYPE as string,
		ID_SK as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		DT_FILETIME as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		STORECODE = StoreCode,
		ENTITYCOMMERCIALREGISTRATIONNO = EntityCommercialRegistrationNo,
		ENTITYCOMMERCIALLICENSENO = EntityCommercialLicenseNo,
		WAREHOUSESTORECOMMERCIALREGISTRATIONNO = WarehouseStoreCommercialRegistrationNo,
		WAREHOUSESTORECOMMERCIALLICENSENO = WarehouseStoreCommercialLicenseNo,
		WAREHOUSESTORECODE = WarehouseStoreCode,
		AREANAME = AreaName,
		STNAME = StName,
		AREACODE = AreaCode,
		STNO = StNo,
		BUILDINGID = BuildingID,
		MAPLOCATIONURL = MapLocationURL,
		TOTALSTOREAREAM2 = TotalStoreAreaM2,
		STORAGECAPACITYINTON = StorageCapacityinTON,
		STORAGETYPE = StorageType,
		ID_SK,
		DS_FILENAME,
		DT_FILETIME
	)) ~> stgWarehouse
